titleStmt.title: SII 7.119: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 119. (A.R. No. 107 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
malaiyan vinaiyaivenṟānāna karikālacoḻa Āṭaiyūrnāṭāḻvāṟkum ceṅkeṇi Ammaiyappan Attimallanāna vikkiramacoḻaccampuvarāyaṟkum Irājarājatevan viṭukātaḻakiyaperumāḷāna IrājarājaAtikaimānen kalveṭṭinapaṭiyāvatu Ivarkaḷ Enakku Orukālamum tappātirukka nānum Ivarkaḷukku Orukālamum tappātirukkakaṭavenāka
kavum Ivarkaḷuk kinnātār Enak kinnātārkaḷākavum Enak kinnātār Ivarkaḷuk kinnātārkaḷākavum Ivarkaḷ pakai En pakaiyākavum En pakai Ivarkaḷ pakaiyākavum yātavarāyarpakkalum ceyyakaṅkar pakkalum kulottuṅkacoḻaccampuvarāyar piḷḷaikaḷpakkalum Āḷu molaiyum pokakkāṭṭutal Uṟavupaṇṇutal ceyyātenākavum
yil nāṭumunpu Irājarājatevar potuninṟapaṭiye Eṅkaḷil E llaikollaikaḷ niṟpatākavum Irupattonṟāvatu Āvaṇimātattu ceyta nilaimai kāṭṭinapaṭiye maṟṟuḷḷa kāriyaṅkaḷum Orukālamum tappāte yirukka kaṭavenākavum Ippaṭi cammatitten viṭukātaḻakiyaperumāḷen Ippaṭikkut tappinenākil Enak kinnāta carimāḻvān ceruppum Eṭuttut tampalamum tinṟenāven .

p.seg: An inscribed slab is lost at the beginning and the stones are not in order.

div.p: Digital edition of SII 7.119 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
